findings.title: ERC20 interface
findings.description: Usage of ERC20 interface on Binance Smart Chain network instead of BEP20 standard.

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The massUpdatePools function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: Zero address checking
findings.description: There is no zero address checking in following functions at DMSMasterFarmer contract.
